item.description:
This is not a scheduled event. It is for those who are requring transfer to and from JFK only. Please do not reply unless you are going to Ireland!!!

The time is tentative...so don't worry about that. I would like those who are going to need transfer to RSVP here. Also, please post where you are going to get the bus in the comment field so I have somewhat of a feel for that. If you can get dropped off and picked up...that would be ideal. I will keep you updated on pickup locations...but I will say this...there will be a pickup in Hartford, another in Waterbury/ Southington and. last but not least. in Danbury.

I am posting this here as a meetup because as we discussed I will need payment for this ASAP and in order for me to collect monies on the site...I need to schedule as an event!

So, don't fail me kitties...please RSVP as soon as possible on this one!

IF YOU ARE NOT A MEMBER OF HAVE FUN WILL TRAVEL...YOU WILL HAVE TO JOIN TO PAY ONLINE. IF YOU WISH TO SEND A CHECK ...SND TO TERRI BRUNO, 319 TODD ROAD, WOLCOTT, CT 06716. Check will need to be received by Tuesday, Oct 27th.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the HAPPY TRAVELERS practicing their Irish stepdancing in the parking lot...lol!!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Ireland Bus Transfer to and from JFK!!!
